root.name: DogDay
root.description: DogDay is a first-person point and click adventure game where you play as an anthropomorphic dog living under the brutal regime of Chegga the dictator. With full control of the media, Chegga has placed his friends in numerous positions of power.Players must collect evidence of Chegga's corrupt actions and sell it to a shadowy group called Coalition Against Totalitarian Society (C.A.T.S.), which will then use that information to wrestle control away from Chegga. Ultimately, the player is collecting this information about Chegga to make some money, purchase a train ticket, and leave this place for a better life.
